name: Gideon's NMEA Processor
short_description:
Created by Gideon N. Kiratu
===========================
Please find the runnable file in the "Runnable File" folder,
example of the NMEA strings in the "NMEA text Files" folder
And the source codes in the "Source Files" Folder

To run the program:
	1.	Double click the "NMEAProcessor.exe" file in the "Runnable File" folder,
	2.	Once the (On-click) application has run, import the NMEA Strings from the "NMEA Strings.txt" file,
	3. 	You can choose either to process the strings one by one using the "Process String" button, 
		or process the whole file by clicking the "Export All to File" button, Which saves the output
		to a text file.
